thread.section_title: The Hide London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fabulous Stay
thread.title_full: Fabulous Stay - Review of The Hide London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Andy P
title: Fabulous Stay
text: Must agree with all the other reviews .... The Hide is a fabulous little gem of a Hotel .... located just a 20 min tube ride into the centre of London .... the free car parking was a massive positive as was the complimentary soft drinks and tea and coffee My room was tastefully modern and perfect for business trips or couples alike . A special mention for Lorella who went way above and beyond to ensure my stay was a memorable one .... and I will be back ....
